name: Quan's Software Development Blog
body:
### Welcome to Quan's software development tips page
Hopes it could give you a little value.

### Test-Driven Development
[Essence of TDD](https://github.com/bzquan/Documents/blob/gh-pages/Documents/TestEssenceOfTDD.md)  
[Synchronizing Multi threads in testing](https://github.com/bzquan/Documents/blob/master/Documents/TestMultiThread.md)  

### C++
[How to split string](https://github.com/bzquan/Documents/blob/master/Documents/CppSplit.md)  
[How to remove elements from a range collection(Remove-Erase-Idiom)](https://github.com/bzquan/Documents/blob/master/Documents/CppRemoveEraseIdiom.md)

### Qt
[How to deploy Qt Windows application](https://github.com/bzquan/Documents/blob/master/Documents/QtDeploy.md)  

### Others
[Markdown help from stackoverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/editing-help)  
[How to add image](https://github.com/bzquan/Documents/blob/master/Documents/MarkdownHowToAddImage.md)  
[How to add table](https://github.com/bzquan/Documents/blob/master/Documents/MarkdownTable.md)
[W3C Color definitions](http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/types.html#ColorKeywords)
